name: Platformer (Riadazz)
description:
Hey there, This is my first try on making a platformer.

its pretty simple has only 5 fast levels that you can switch in between after you finish all of them the first time.

I used free art from the awsome artist PixelFrog.

Pixel Frog website : https://pixelfrog-store.itch.io/

as for the audio i used a random sound effect generator and free sound track.

hope you enjoy playing, have fun.
